SENT.plain: Plasma levels of FPA and FPB beta 15-42 in patients with BehÃ§et's disease were examined
In the patients, the mean levels of FPA and FPB beta 15-42 were significantly higher than controls (p less than 0.001)
Fibrinolysis subsequent to coagulation may be activated in the patients
The levels of both FPA and FPB beta 15-42 were higher during attack than in remission
The caution should be taken these levels to understand the disease activity
